Push Corsair Greymon into the water. Tell Skickpit to Take the Lift to the Surface After Killing his Masters Persuade the Deep Rothe in attacking its Master When you meet Morghal and Orgarth in the Grymforge, ask "Did you say you keep slaves here?" then say "Not a problem in the slightest"

Put up Graffiti on Vlaakith's painting Convince Ghustil Stornugoss that the tadpole is dead

Chapter 1 Camp/ 1 on 1 dialogue

At Camp, agreeing with Shadowheart that the first priority is to find a healer.
